co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block

Class BlockHasFluid

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.block.Block
      • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block.BlockHasMeasure
        • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block.BlockHasFluid
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockTank

    public abstract class BlockHasFluid
extends BlockHasMeasure
    Base for blocks that have a liquid value, using the Measures MPI. Can be used for Fluid Tanks. This is also a reference for other mod blocks that use the Measures MPI.
    Author:
    Niadel
